mods.abstract: The California Magazine of Western Square and Round Dancing by the Square Dancers of Southern California. This edition includes a table of contents which lists the following: SQUARE DANCES "Ewe Turn", "Two Through the Sides", and "Somebody Goofed" ROUND DANCES "Dutch Treat Mixer", "Capri Circle Couple Mixer", and "Just the Way it Is" SPECIAL FEATURES "Flashes From Convention City", "The Old, Old Family of Do-Si-Do", "Some Looks at Books", "Round Dancing Phrasing" and "The Caller and Musicians, Chapter Three". This edition also includes the the regular features entitled "As I see it", "Ideal Corral", "The Square Dance Picture", "Woman's Page", "The Square of the Month", "Round the Outside Ring", "From the Floor" and "Calendar of Square Dancing Events".
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
